alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 9:26PM CDT until April 10 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Neches River Near Town Bluff Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Hawks Road near the gauge becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 19.4 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 13.3 Fri 8 pm CDT 19.3 17.9 14.5 &&
